403470.name: MAGIX PC Check & Tuning 2016
403470.description:
MAGIX PC Check & Tuning 2016 keeps your computer fast and powerful. It finds weak points and problems in your system automatically, removes the causes, and carries out a range of optimizations. Enjoy smoother gaming as a result of enhanced speed and performance.

3 steps to make your PC faster and more stable:

Clean up: Clean your hard drive and free up storage space by deleting unnecessary and particularly large files.
Update:Â Bring your software and drivers up to date for a smooth-running system.
Accelerate: Optimize Windows settings and startup and get more performance with energy saving settings.
Â 

Improve your gaming experience

  • Steam boost:Â Ends all unnecessary background processes in one click for maximum gaming performance.
  • Â Performance boost:Â Removes unnecessary programs from the startup and deactivates unimportant services.
  • Update drivers:Â Keeps your graphics card and sound card drivers up to date and automatically searches for new updates.
  • Â Update software: Brings overÂ 2000 program titles automatically up to date on request.
  • Clean hard drive and registry:Â Accelerates hard drive access, deletes unnecessary files, and stabilizes your system.
  • Smart defragmentation:Â Uses intelligent file categorization to get the most out of your hard drive.
  • Â Internet tuning:Â Optimizes network and browser settings for faster surfing and protects your privacy online.Â 

Â 

New in this version: Top performance for Windows 10 right from the start

Optimize Windows 10 settings
Customize Windows 10 to your personal requirements and gain access to hidden settings.PC Check & Tuning 2016 combines all important Windows functions in a clear and easy to use interface.
Â 
Latest updates for Windows 10
Weaknesses always emerge in new operating systems in the months after they are published, which need to be fixed by updates. PC Check & Tuning 2016 installs the latest driver and software updates for you automatically.

Optimize Microsoft Edge Browser
Once upon a time, there was Internet Explorer. PC Check & Tuning 2016 allows you to reliably cover your tracks when using the new Microsoft Edge browser and enables you to surf the Internet faster than ever.
